Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model

Class Codex

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.Codex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Codex extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a Codex.

    • checkPreviousCardConnection

      private boolean checkPreviousCardConnection(int row, int column)
      Method for checking that the card you want to insert is connected to some corner of some previously inserted card.
      Parameters:
      row - The insertion row.
      column - The insertion column.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the card can be inserted.

    • checkTopLeftConnection

      private boolean checkTopLeftConnection(int row, int column)
      Method for checking that the card you want to insert is connected to the top left corner. card.
      Parameters:
      row - The insertion row.
      column - The insertion column.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the card is connected.

      Parameters:
      row - The insertion row.
      column - The insertion column.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the card is connected.

      row - The insertion row.
      column - The insertion column.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the card is connected.

    • checkBottomRightConnection

      private boolean checkBottomRightConnection(int row, int column)
      Method for checking that the card you want to insert is connected to the bottom right corner. card.
      Parameters:
      row - The insertion row.
      column - The insertion column.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the card is connected.

    • checkPreviousCardNULL

      private boolean checkPreviousCardNULL(int row, int column) throws IllegalStateException
      Method to check if the card can be inserted or if there are NULL values in the previously inserted cards.
      Parameters:
      row - The insertion row.
      column - The insertion column.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the card can be inserted.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the specified row or column is out of bounds.

    • checkRequirementPlacement

      private boolean checkRequirementPlacement(Side side)
      Method to verify that a Gold card can be placed.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the card that you want to insert into the codex.
      Returns:
      A boolean that says whether insertion is possible.

    • insertSide

      private void insertSide(Side side, int row, int column) throws RemoteException
      Method for inserting the card side into the codex.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the card that you want to insert into the codex.
      row - The row to insert the side of the card.
      column - The column to insert the side of the card.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an issue with remote communication.

    • downgradeCounterCodex

      private void downgradeCounterCodex(Value value)
      Method to lower the codex counter.
      Parameters:
      value - The value contained in the corner that is covered.

    • upgradeCounterCodex

      private void upgradeCounterCodex(Value value)
      Method to raise the codex counter.
      Parameters:
      value - The value by which you want to increase the count.

    • updateCounterCodex

      private void updateCounterCodex(Side side)
      Method for updating the counter of values present in the codex.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the inserted card.

    • calculatePointCodex

      private void calculatePointCodex(Game game, Side side)
      Method for updating points made by inserting cards into the codex.
      Parameters:
      game - The game.
      side - The side of the inserted card.

    • insertStarterIntoCodex

      public void insertStarterIntoCodex(Side side, Game game, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Method for inserting the Starter card into the codex.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the card to insert.
      game - The game.
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an issue with remote communication.

    • insertIntoCodex

      public boolean insertIntoCodex(Game game, Side side, int row, int column)
      Method of inserting one side of a card into the codex.
      Parameters:
      game - The game of the codex where the card will be inserted.
      side - The side of the card to insert.
      row - The row to insert the side of the card.
      column - The column to insert the side of the card.
      Returns:
      true if the insertion was successful, otherwise false.

    • simulateInsertIntoCodex

      public boolean simulateInsertIntoCodex(Side side, int row, int column) throws Exception
      Method to simulate the insertion of a card into the Codex.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the card to simulate insertion of.
      row - The row in which to simulate the insertion of the side of the card.
      column - The column in which to simulate the insertion of the side of the card.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the card could be inserted in that position.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs.

      column - The column of the desired Side.
      Returns:
      The Side at the specified position, or null if the position is empty or out of bounds.
